TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to create the correct MIP data for the elements (defined at IDT Schemas > Units.xsd > Unit) and the Consumers are able to correctly understand (and display) it.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer creates message elements for Unit with at least all its mandatory Elements. The Consumers receive the data and process them.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created the 'Ground Picture > Forces' topic. The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the Unit is created and all their elements are processed and interpreted correctly on all Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer creates the Unit with name XXX_CU_012 and fills, at least, ALL its mandatory elements.
Notices: XXX in name of the object is meant (in principle) to be replaced by the 3 letter code of the country name. Example for the name of the Unit: ITA_CU_012
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers receive and process (and display) the Unit created and all elements that the Producer created.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The Producer creates an update for the object by changing ALL mandatory elements.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers receive and process (and display) the created Unit and all elements that the Producer created.
